title: Why rarun2 is not behave like it is described?
content:
colleagues.

Simplest question. As many articles in the Net (example https://r2wiki.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tools/rarun2/) and here on forum are describing, i have a rarun2 profile named "r2_profile" file as follows:

```
#!/usr/local/bin/rarun2
stdin=./debruijn
program=./vuln

```
debruijn is a 100 chars long debruijn sequence.
vuln is a ret2win file from here The most basic binexp challenge

Next i run

```
r2 -d ./vuln -r r2_profile

```
r2 shell appears whith ./vuln  code stopped. I issue "dc" to continue and gets() waiting for my input instead of automatically eat contents of the files i have configured in profile. What i am doing wrong?
